# 7.0 Docs

## Core .NET libraries

- [API obsoletions with default diagnostic ID](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/obsolete-apis-with-default-diagnostic.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with the default diagnostic ID.
- [API obsoletions with non-default diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/obsolete-apis-with-custom-diagnostics.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [Asterisk no longer accepted for assembly name attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/assembly-name-wildcard.md): Learn about the breaking change in core .NET libraries in .NET 7 where assembly names no longer accept '*' as a wildcard attribute value.
- [BrotliStream no longer allows undefined CompressionLevel values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/brotlistream-ctor.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the BrotliStream constructors no longer allow undefined CompressionLevel values.
- [C++/CLI projects in Visual Studio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/cpluspluscli-compiler-version.md): Learn about the breaking change in core .NET libraries where Visual Studio version 17.2 is required to compile .NET 7 C++/CLI projects.
- [Collectible Assembly in non-collectible AssemblyLoadContext](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/collectible-assemblies.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where resolving a collectible Assembly in a non-collectible AssemblyLoadContext results in a FileLoadException.
- [DateTime addition methods precision change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/datetime-add-precision.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the precision of the value that's added in DateTime addition methods has increased.
- [Equals method behavior change for NaN](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/equals-nan.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the behavior of some Equals(T other) instance methods changed for NaN values.
- [Generic type constraint on PatternContext<T>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/patterncontext-generic-constraint.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the generic type parameter on PatternContext<T> is constrained to be a struct type.
- [Legacy FileStream strategy removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/filestream-compat-switch.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the ability to use the legacy `FileStream` implementation has been removed.
- [Library support for older frameworks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/old-framework-support.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where core libraries packages are no longer supported on some older frameworks.
- [Maximum precision for numeric format strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/max-precision-numeric-format-strings.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the maximum precision for numeric format strings was changed to 999,999,999.
- [Reflection invoke API exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/reflection-invoke-exceptions.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the exceptions thrown by reflection invoke APIs have changed.
- [Regex patterns with ranges corrected](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/regex-ranges.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where regular expressions that have ranges in the pattern and are used with the RegexOptions.IgnoreCase option might break.
- [System.Drawing.Common config switch removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/system-drawing.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change where the EnableUnixSupport switch to enable System.Drawing.Common support on non-Windows operating systems was removed.
- [System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe NuGet package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/unsafe-package.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the 'Unsafe' type implementations have been unified and the System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe NuGet package is no longer produced.
- [Time fields on symbolic links](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/symbolic-link-timestamps.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where updating CreationTime[Utc], LastAccessTime[Utc], and LastWriteTime[Utc] on a symbolic link no longer affects the target.
- [Tracking linked cache entries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/memorycache-tracking.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET where MemoryCache no longer tracks linked cache entries by default.
- [Validate CompressionLevel for BrotliStream](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/7.0/compressionlevel-validation.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the CompressionLevel parameter to BrotliStream constructors is now validated.
